General.Name: Keum Kang Steel Co. Ltd
General.Description: Keum Kang Steel Co., Ltd. engages in the processing and selling of cold-rolled coils in South Korea. Its products are used as an industrial raw material for automobiles, home appliances, construction, and industrial appliances industries. The company is also involved in the consulting and investment activities. Keum Kang Steel Co., Ltd. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
